title: The Kids Are Back (w/ Monroe Martin, Derek Gaines, Joe DeRosa & Corinne Fisher)
description: Monroe Martin and Derek Gaines join the show & Monroe talks about growing up in the foster care system in Philadelphia. Joe DeRosa guest hosts with Jay & Corinne Fisher joins the show sharing how she got an awkward text before her show the night before. Jay and Dan review the new season of Surviving R. Kelly.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
